title: Cucumber-Tequila Cooler Recipe
full_text:
Cucumber-Tequila Cooler Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
(4-inch) section
celery
(about
3/4
ounce
)
Pinch
salt
1
(2-inch) section
English cucumber
(about
2 1/2
ounces
), peeled
1/2
ounce
agave nectar
1
ounce
fresh lime juice
, from
1 to 2
limes
1 1/2
ounces
silver tequila
2
ounces
seltzer
, chilled
Garnish:
cucumber slice
(optional)
Directions
Slice celery and cucumber into 1/2 inch slices. Add celery and salt to cocktail shaker and muddle until broken up. Add cucumber and agave nectar, muddle until smashed, about 20 seconds.
Add lime juice and tequila to shaker and fill 2/3 full with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain into highball glass. Top with seltzer, stir gently and serve with cucumber slice garnish if desired.
Special Equipment
muddler, cocktail shaker and strainer
Tequila
Mexican
Cinco de Mayo
Summer Drinks
